Japanese.name: Japanese
Japanese.description: Japanese culture is known for its art forms, cuisine, and traditions.
facts: Bowing is a common greeting and shows respect.
Tea ceremonies are an important part of Japanese culture.
Karaoke is a popular form of entertainment.

Indian.name: Indian
Indian.description: Indian culture is diverse and rich in traditions, languages, and religions.
facts: Cricket is a very popular sport in India.
Diwali, the festival of lights, is a major celebration.
The Taj Mahal is a famous landmark and symbol of love.
traditions: Raksha Bandhan (festival celebrating the bond between siblings)
Dussehra (celebration of the victory of good over evil)

Nigerian.name: Nigerian
Nigerian.description: Nigerian culture is diverse, with many ethnic groups and languages.
facts: Nollywood is the Nigerian film industry, one of the largest in the world.
Jollof rice is a popular dish in Nigeria and West Africa.
Traditional clothing is often colorful and vibrant.
traditions: Igue Festival (celebration of the Oba of Benin)

Brazilian.name: Brazilian
Brazilian.description: Brazilian culture is vibrant, known for its music, dance, and festivals.
facts: Football (soccer) is the most popular sport in Brazil.
Carnaval is a major annual festival with music, parades, and dancing.
Samba is a famous Brazilian dance and music genre.

Italian.name: Italian
Italian.description: Italian culture is known for its cuisine, art, fashion, and architecture.
facts: Pasta and pizza are famous Italian dishes.
Italy is home to many historical landmarks, including the Colosseum.
Fashion is an important aspect of Italian culture.

Egyptian.name: Egyptian
Egyptian.description: Egyptian culture is one of the oldest civilizations, known for its pharaohs, pyramids, and ancient history.
facts: The pyramids of Giza are iconic landmarks.
Hieroglyphics are an ancient form of writing.
The Nile River is vital to Egypt's agriculture and history.

Russian.name: Russian
Russian.description: A culture known for its deep literary traditions, historical complexity, distinctive cuisine, and strong emphasis on community and hospitality.
facts: Russia spans 11 time zones, making it the largest country in the world by land area.
The Trans-Siberian Railway is the longest railway line in the world.
Russian literature has produced globally influential authors like Tolstoy, Dostoevsky, and Chekhov.
traditions: New Year's celebrations with Ded Moroz (Grandfather Frost)

Mexican.name: Mexican
Mexican.description: Mexican culture is known for its vibrant traditions, flavorful cuisine, and strong sense of community.
facts: Mexico is home to 35 UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
Mexican cuisine is recognized as an Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO.
The Aztecs and Mayans made significant contributions to art, science, and agriculture.
traditions: Día de los Muertos (Day of the Dead)
